Class ChromosomeWindow

java.lang.Object
  yu.einstein.gdp2.core.ChromosomeWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<ChromosomeWindow>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenomeWindow, ScoredChromosomeWindow
public class ChromosomeWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<ChromosomeWindow>

The ChromosomeWindow class represents a window on a chromosome.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie

compareTo

public int compareTo(ChromosomeWindow otherChromosomeWindow)
A ChromosomeWindow is superior to another one if its position start is greater or if its position start is equal but its position stop is greater.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<ChromosomeWindow>
